item.title: Marianne Faithful - This Little Bird
item.description:
There’s
a little bird
That somebody sends
down to the earth
To live on the wind
born on the wind
And he sleeps
on the wind-
This little a bird
that somebody sends
He’s light
and fragile
And feathered
sky blue
So thin and graceful
the sun shines
Through
this little a bird
That lives
on the wind-
This little a bird
that somebody sends-
He flys so high up
in the sky
Out of reach
of human eye
And the only time that
he touches the around-
Is when
that little a bird
Is when
that little a bird
Is when that
little a bird dies-
